## Using git

git is a command line version control system.  we can use it from R studio (via the "git pane" in the upper right) or from the command line (i.e. in the "Terminal Tab")

The steps for using git involve :
 
 - Initiate a git repository
 git init
 or click the little box in RStudio
 
 - Do your work (same as ever) 
    add files
    edit files
    save files
    
- **Add files we care about to the "stage"**
  git add yourfilename if multiple files add a space between two file names
  click the add to "stage" in RStudio
  
- **Commit your changes**
   git commit -m "your message"
   click "commit" button in RStudio
